name: Smoked Trout Spread
keywords: appetizer, cream cheese, smoked trout, gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 2 8-ounce packages cream cheese, at room temperature
3/4 cup (firmly packed) coarsely chopped fresh basil leaves
7 whole scallions, chopped, or 1/3 cup (firmly packed) sliced chives
Crackers or sliced cucumber, for serving

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, layer the trout, 1 1/2 packages cream cheese, basil and 3 tablespoons horseradish. Add white pepper and scallions or chives. Pulse several times until mixture is roughly blended. Add remaining half-package of cream cheese, and pulse again until mixture is smooth. Taste, and add additional horseradish if needed.

Transfer mixture to a wide serving bowl. Halve tomatoes lengthwise and remove seeds. Cut tomatoes into 1/2-inch dice and pat dry on paper towels. Fold tomatoes into trout spread. Serve with crackers or slices of cucumber, or refrigerate and use within three days.
